entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
